text: Zhena Ibrakhima stoyala nedaleko, slushaya ikh razgovor. Ona obradovalas' spaseniyu Luta, syna brata svoyego muzha, i rassmeyalas'. My cherez Svoikh angelov obradovali yeyo vest'yu o tom, chto ona rodit ot svoyego muzha Ibrakhima syna, kotorogo nazovut Iskhakom (Isaakom). On budet zhit', i u nego budet syn po imeni Yakub (Iakov)
